alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Bibb; Glascock; Hancock; Jones; Putnam; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 4:50PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Baldwin, Wilkinson, Bibb, northwestern Twiggs, southeastern Putnam, southern Hancock, southwestern Glascock, northwestern Washington, northeastern Crawford and eastern Jones Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 450 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Devereux to Postell, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Milledgeville, Sandersville, Gray, Irwinton, Gordon, Tennille, Ivey, McIntyre, Toomsboro, Oconee, Payne, Deepstep, Edge Hill, Payne City, Midway-Hardwick, Edgehill, Meriwether, Postell, and Downs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Bibb; Glascock; Hancock; Jones; Putnam; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson
